      • nextRound

        public void nextRound()
               throws java.lang.Throwable

      • otherPlayers

        public static SimpleLinkedList<Player> otherPlayers(Player player)
        Returns a list with al the players, except the one passed as a parameter. This method its used for generating the minigames and all the events.
        Parameters:
        player - player that can't be on the list.
        Returns:
        SimpleLinkedList with the other players.
